seo.title: Import services
seo.description: Eagle Air offers customs clearance services all over the world. We use the AEO standard and have our own customs warehouse.

intro.title: Import.<0/>Years of <1>experience</1> in the industry.
intro.paragraph1: We can offer customs clearance anywhere in the world, by our own staff or by reliable agents who are carefully selected. We work according to the <0>AEO</0> standard. This ensures fewer errors and additional checks.
intro.paragraph2: We have our own customs warehouse. This allows us to store your goods while waiting for the necessary documents for customs formalities.

stats.title: From plane to consignee
stats.description: At Eagle Air we have our own trucks. This allows us to deliver the majority of the goods to the consignee ourselves. Our drivers are at your service!

team.title: <0>Up-to-date</0> with the latest procedures
team.card: Our staff continues to educate themselves to always provide you with the latest information.
